cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))

exm.mng: lit. an ant trying to shake a tree, to overrate oneself (idiom)
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree, to overrate oneself (idiom)
lit. an ant trying to shake a big tree (idiom), fig. to overrate one's own strength, also written 蚍蜉撼樹|蚍蜉撼树[pi2 fu2 han4 shu4]
